= Source checkout =

If you are new to Git please follow the [http://help.github.com/set-up-git-redirect Set Up Git] guide first.

Feel free to [http://help.github.com/fork-a-repo/ fork our repository] and later send a pull request so we can review your code and commit it into the official WebGL Earth code base. We are looking forward to your contribution!

== GIT access ==

If you just want to get the code, then use this command:

{{{
git clone git://github.com/webglearth/webglearth.git
}}}

== SVN access ==

If you really need access to the code via SVN, the [https://github.com/webglearth/webglearth GitHub] provides also SVN gateway, so you can still keep using the editors which supports only SVN:
{{{
svn checkout https://svn.github.com/webglearth/webglearth
}}}
